Therefore<WG1223> I<WG5124> tell<WG3004> you,<WG5213> all things whatever<WG3745><WG99999> you pray<WG154> and ask<WG4336> for,<WG4100> believe that<WG3754> you have received<WG2983> them,<WG2532> and you<WG5213> shall have them.<WG2071>

They<WG2532> came<WG2064> again<WG3825> to<WG1519> Jerusalem,<WG2414> and<WG2532> as he<WG846> was walking<WG4043> in<WG1722> the temple,<WG2411> the chief priests,<WG749> and<WG2532> the scribes,<WG1122> and<WG2532> the elders<WG4245> came<WG2064> to<WG4314> him,<WG846>
